function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability of hvac system to efficiently kill microbes transmitted by droplets.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi in inactivating more-resistant bacteria and fungal spores","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate mixing of room air for uvgi to effectively inactivate microorganisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect implementation of combination of general ventilation system and uv lamps","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to uv light at 253.7 nm can cause harm to unprotected skin and eyes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi fixtures in inactivating certain types of microorganisms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence of uvgi efficacy on airflow conditions in the room.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spores being resistant to uvgi can lead to ineffective removal of biological agents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of uvgi depends strongly on the type of virus nucleic acid, leading to varying susceptibility to uv inactivation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rh relative humidity providing protection against uv-induced dna or rna damage for viruses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system causing the spread of airborne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misidentification of true airborne infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of infectious agents to uvgi exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in different environmental conditions such as high and low relative humidity rh","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from surfaces to hands and subsequent transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in biological fluids such as mucus, feces, and blood","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-range aerosol transmission of infectious material","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dispersal of pathogens into the air over short distances","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of environmental factors on the movement and suspension of infectious droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Droplet transmission of infectious agents eg. influenza virus within a 1-2 meter range through respiratory droplets and direct or indirect contact.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious agents not solely correlated with the size of the microbes in droplet nuclei or larger droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pathogen-laden droplets expelled during medical procedures may travel further and reach deeper into the respiratory tract of susceptible persons","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of infectious agents","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inactivation of mycobacterium tuberculosis by uvgi systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of new infectious diseases and pandemic strains of influenza","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly drug-resistant strains of m tuberculosis reported in several countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient evidence on the actual performance of uvgi systems in hospital rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited practical application of uvgi in health care buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gaps in existing evidence regarding design and operational factors impacting the efficacy of uvgi systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate prediction of outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection and diagnosis of infected patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient anticipation of critical cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on information from news articles to understand the use of data analytics in global emergency situations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on country-specific measures may lead to omission of instances where other governments and organizations utilize big data technologies in pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of covid-19 through chest x-ray or ct image analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing applications and data exchange","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risks to healthcare data and covid-19 research organizations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-system interoperability in healthcare","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data exchange due to legal issues, limited financial support, and international communication challenges","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor quality and incomplete healthcare data impacting response to pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of historical data for new virus transmission, incubation period, and immunity duration.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in utilizing big data analytics for covid-19 due to limited evidence and data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evolution of virus and development of mutant variants complicating prediction of covid-19 incidence and outcomes.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai tools for monitoring social distancing compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of cough sound analysis tool for identifying potential patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deployment of covid-19 bus equipped with ai tools for screening based on x-ray analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai solutions in healthcare without proper validation and oversight","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient data privacy and security measures in covid-19 tracking apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for over-reliance on ai and automation for public safety and crowd monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of big data analytics may lead to over-reliance on technology and neglect of human input in decision-making.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
